mcq.statement: Choose the correctly punctuated sentence: My aunt who lives in Karachi, is a doctor., My aunt, who lives in Karachi is a doctor., My aunt, who lives in karachi, is a doctor., None of these

options.a: My aunt who lives in Karachi, is a doctor.
options.b: My aunt, who lives in Karachi is a doctor.
options.c: My aunt, who lives in karachi, is a doctor.
